This is called the object has already been eliminated and its substance has already been eliminated.

As for objects already eliminated but whose substance has not yet been eliminated, this refers to those wholesome minds of the formless realm that are bound to the formless realm, whose objects are bound to the form realm, for one who has already eliminated craving for the form realm but has not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm.
